name: Jellie Jail
description:
A strategy puzzle game where you command jellies to escape a series of room filled with ghosts!

A game by Xeratol (https://twitter.com/xeratol) and Brevitius (https://twitter.com/Brevitius)

"Scheming Weasel (slower version)" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
